summary: Conditions at the Navy's shipyards—which maintain its aircraft carriers and submarines—are poor and much of their equipment is outdated. The Navy is working to improve these shipyards. For instance, it has a project underway to improve the dry docks at its Portsmouth Naval Shipyard. We found that the estimated cost for this project increased from $528 million to $2.2 billion between 2019 and 2021. The...
title: Navy Readiness: Actions Needed to Address Cost and Schedule Estimates for Shipyard Improvement
